sentences.en: " Leadership is based on inspiration, not domination; on cooperation, not intimidation. "
sentences.cn: 费 译 :领导力应该基于鼓励, 而不是控制; 应该基于合作, 而不是胁迫.

sentences.en: Dulles said Russia had overextended herself in her drive for world domination.
sentences.cn: 杜勒斯说苏俄在称霸美世界的驱使下过分扩张其势力.

sentences.en: Her experience of men was of domination and brutality.
sentences.cn: 男人给她的感受是支配一切，野蛮残暴。

sentences.en: His domination by his brother made him very angry.
sentences.cn: 他被他哥哥所控制,这使他非常气愤.

sentences.en: However, financial strength alone will not translate into domination of global banking.
sentences.cn: 然而, 仅仅是财力并不能转化为在全球银行业的主导地位.

sentences.en: It is accepted that the superpowers are each seeking world wide domination.
sentences.cn: 公认的事实是:超级大国都在各自寻求世界范围的支配权.

sentences.en: New gamemode: Domination ( - dom ): Your team gains bonus income if it controls both lanes.
sentences.cn: 新游戏模式: -Domination ( -dom ): 假如你的队伍控制上下两条路将获得额外的收入.

sentences.en: One in a position of supremacy or domination over others.
sentences.cn: 最高统治者具有至高无上的权威或支配他人的人.

sentences.en: Religious bodies and religious affairs are not subject to any foreign domination.
sentences.cn: 宗教团体和宗教事务不受外国势力的支配.

sentences.en: Some cynics say that sport is a mere instrument of capitalist domination.
sentences.cn: 一些愤世嫉俗者认为体育不过是资本主义统治的工具而已.

sentences.en: The company has struggled to maintain its domination in the marketplace.
sentences.cn: 该公司奋力维持其市场优势.

sentences.en: The country came under foreign domination.
sentences.cn: 该国受到外国势力的控制.

sentences.en: The Court's desire to shield " quasi judicial " officers from executive domination has obvious appeal.
sentences.cn: 法院避开行政一统天下而保护 “ 准司法 ” 官员的愿望显然具有感召力.

sentences.en: The domination of content by commercial advertising took different forms in magazines and broadcasting.
sentences.cn: 商业广告以各种形式操纵着杂志和广播的内容.

sentences.en: The imperialists use this ideology and culture as a lever for easily realizing their domination and subjugation, aggression and plunder of other countries.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义者使用这种思想和文化作为一种杠杆，轻易地实现其统治、征服、侵略以及掠夺他国的目的。

sentences.en: They had five centuries of domination by the Romans.
sentences.cn: 他们被罗马人统治了5个世纪。

words.tran_cn: 显性的；占优势的；支配的，统治的
占主导地位的；强势的；占统治地位的；[数] 受控的
控制，支配；处于支配地位（dominate的过去式）
控制；支配；占优势；在…中占主要地位
